key.name: file-overwrite-output
key.description: If this is set to true the files in the output folder that have the same name as one of the files you're converting will be overwritten.

key.name: convert-done-noticiation
key.summary: Display notification when files are converted
key.description: If this is enabled Simple Convert will show a notification to let you know the files are converted.

key.name: remove-from-list-converted
key.summary: Remove file from list after it's converted
key.description: If this is enabled the file will be removed from the list after it is converted.
